::Shadow Wing::

She was about to turn the corner when she heard him speak about her.
She stopped dead in her tracks.
She turned and walked back down the hall and went to her quarters.
She locked the door behind her and stayed there.

"I'm trying to impress him? Hardly! All I do is try to make him a 
little bit happy and he just tells me that Shadow Wing is a stupid 
name for a wolf.   Like I didn't know that.  Like I wasn't go change 
me name.  Besides, who cares what my name is anyway." She threw her 
arms in the air.
"And me tring to make him happy is a dissaster?" She let out an 
agrivated sigh." Males, the whole lot of them. I'll never figure them 
out. You try to make them happy and they gat mad at you.  You try to 
do something nice and they call it a disaster. Well fine. I'm through 
trying.  He can just...just...jsut stay int he engine room. GRRRRRR!"

She sat down in a chair and fumed a while longer.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Shadow Wing left so Lunarpine turned and returned to his corner. he 
> lay back put his hands benieth his head and relaxed. the engine 
room 
> was cool with the cold metal floor. just right to relaxe. "Another 
> disaster diverted, whens that bird going to stop trying so hard to 
> impress him?" he thought as he laid down.
>
